page.title: 12TALISKER JUNIOR ARCHERS.
page.content: This is a club for all the young people in our area from 8 to 16.In it we learn lots of interesting things about archery as well as how to use the bow and look after the equipment.Safety plays a very important part in the sport and all Club members must obey the rules set out.We have joined the official organisations for archery, and hope to earn badges.When we are good enough, we can take part in competitions. To raise funds for the club,the primary school and some parents put on a concert in the Village Hall. The club also applied to the Sports Council for grant aid.The community also gave some other financial help,to get the club started.
